product_name: NiteRider Pro 1800 LED Race Bike Light
long_description: Light and bright, the NiteRider Pro 1800 LED Race bike light boasts an impressive lumens-per-gram ratio to light the route ahead of you when every gram and every second count. Built to pump out 1,800 lumens of light with little weight, helping keep a race pace through the night. Switch at top of the headlamp lets you quickly and easily change the amount of light output. Light levels include high (1,800 lumens), medium (700 lumens), low (600 lumens) and a battery-saving "walk" mode (80 lumens). Flashing mode alerts others to your presence and has a run time of up to 13 hrs. 8-step power gauge on top of the headlamp shows you the remaining battery life; battery life ranges from 1.5 - 25 hrs., depending on settings. Light can be mounted on handlebar (fits up to 31.8mm) or helmet (mount included); battery can be strapped to frame or stashed in a pack. NiteRider Pro 1800 LED Race bike light system includes headlamp, handlebar mount, helmet mount, lithium ion battery and extension cable.
